comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: George Chip (1888-1960) was born George Chipulonis, in Scranton, Pennsylvania. He held the world middleweight title from October 11, 1913, until April 7, 1914, having successfully defended it five times in six months. His career lasted from 1909 to 1922, with 71 wins in a total of 164 bouts. BoxRec bout list.
